entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 27.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 27. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High minus 24.
